trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown to communicate errors to the client when the client connects to non-.NET Framework applications that cannot throw exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 引发以向客户端传达错误，当客户端连接到无法引发异常的非.NET Framework 应用程序的异常。

trans-unit.source: ServerException uses the HRESULT COR_E_SERVER, which has the value 0x8013150E.
trans-unit.target: ServerException 使用 HRESULT COR_E_SERVER，其值 0x8013150E。

trans-unit.source: ServerException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: ServerException 使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ServerException, see the ServerException constructors.
trans-unit.target: ServerException 的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 ServerException 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The empty string ("")|
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>类的实例的初始属性值: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|空字符串 ("") |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref>使用指定的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class: |Property Type|Condition| |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string|
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>类的实例的初始属性值: |属性类型 |条件 | |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message`字符串 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string|
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>类的实例的初始属性值: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

If the `InnerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InnerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
